title: Swift Transportation Earns Buy Rating from Cowen and Company (SWFT)
content:
Swift Transportation (NASDAQ:SWFT)‘s stock had its “buy” rating reiterated by equities researchers at Cowen and Company in a research report issued on Tuesday, AnalystRatings.NET reports. Shares of Swift Transportation (NASDAQ:SWFT) traded down 0.46% during midday trading on Tuesday, hitting $15.15. The stock had a trading volume of 2,886,144 shares. The stock has a 50 day […] 
 
The post appeared first on Ticker Report .
